sentences.en: And when his wings enfold you yield to him.
sentences.cn: 当他的翅膀拥抱着你,请你屈从他!

sentences.en: Anticipating your to enfold my hands To return home.
sentences.cn: 等待你来牵我的手.回家.

sentences.en: As I slid into bed, Lucile reached out to enfold me in her arms.
sentences.cn: 当我躺上床的时候, 露西尔探身过来用双臂抱住我.

sentences.en: Aurora felt the opium haze enfold her.
sentences.cn: 奥萝拉感觉自己被笼罩在鸦片烟霾中。

sentences.en: When love beckons to you, follow him. When his wings enfold you, yield to him.
sentences.cn: 当爱召唤你时, 请追随她. 当爱的羽翼拥抱你时, 请顺从她.

sentences.en: Winona was now comfortably enfolded in a woolly dressing-gown.
sentences.cn: 维诺娜身上正舒服地裹着件羊毛晨衣。

trans.tran_en: If something enfolds an object or person, it covers, surrounds, or is wrapped around that object or person
